about_the_game:
Get a taste of the SOUL PARK experience!

This new demo lets you play as long as you want: only the progress tree and park expansions are limited by a capped player level.

  • Build fancy rides and design your own roller coasters!

  • Manage your shops to generate maximum profit!

  • Decorate your park as you wish to find the perfect balance for your customers!

  • Maintain your park by playing mini-games! Each ride is repaired using a different mini-game depending on its theme.

  • Gain experience and unlock new objects in the progress tree!

  • Fight corruption and push the boundaries of your kingdom! These little beings are born from the sins of wandering souls, it's up to you to sort them out and decide who deserves to enter your park!
